channel.title: NPC SPAWNING, no not autospawn.cfg lol
channel.description: I'm wandering if any one knows how to make a npc spawn after you kill another, for example the Barrows Mini game. ( which I'm working on ) I want it to spawn Ahrims when I kill Dharok's. I don't want them to drop keys or any thing like that, so don't post that please.

item.title: NPC SPAWNING, no not autospawn.cfg lol
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

That didn’t work, I tried to change it around a little lol, but thanks for trying.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC SPAWNING, no not autospawn.cfg lol
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

public void spawnIt(int x, int y, int id) { NPC.npcId = id; NPC.absX = x; NPC.absY = y; }

spawnIt(x, y, id);

Try something like that. Mess with it to get it to work.

Read full topic
